title: Is Justin Bieber's 'Yummy' a good enough song to keep his career alive or is it indicative of an imminent fall from grace? - Quora

response.answer_text: I started to try to listen to “yummy”but it is so annoying and awful that I cannot stand to hear it.but it is doing ok for the current iTunes but the contributors on the Pulse music site that are more informed on the charts and music are saying that it is a great flop. So I don't know if his career is over but many people who are involved with the charts and things like that think it's very likely the end.
